fields.description: A Gentle Introduction to Python is a friendly, low-risk introduction to the Python language and computer programming in general. Pulling materials from around the web, the course delivers readings and exercises for you and your peers to incorporate into your first coding projects.
fields.caption: Slither into computer programming with Python.
fields.title: Programming with Python

fields.description: Worried that your English writing isn’t good enough for university? This course is designed to help you learn the basics of university-level academic writing. Through video, discussions, peer and self evaluation, you’ll build a solid foundation for your future writing and finish the course with completed essay on a topic of your choosing.
fields.caption: Get on the write track for university-level writing.
fields.title: Academic Writing
fields.prerequisite: High school level English (TOEFL 32 or higher)

fields.description: Employers and universities alike value candidates with strong communication and critical listening skills. This course offers an opportunity to learn about public speaking and begin practicing right away. During the course you will design and deliver two presentations on topics of your choosing. You'll also learn how to insightfully assess yours and your peers work.
fields.caption: dd
fields.title: Public Speaking

fields.description: Looking to study for your GED Certification or a high school equivalency credential? Then you’ll need to prepare for the math sections of these tests. Good news is, you don’t have to do it alone!  This course will  help you build your own learning path through the content you need to master. You'll also have access to a study group of your peers, who will be there to support you through the process.
fields.caption: Looking to study for your GED Certification or a high school equivalency credential? Then you’ll need to prepare for the math sections of these tests. Good news is, you don’t have to do it alone!  This course will  help you build your own learning path through the content you need to master. You'll also have access to a study group of your peers, who will be there to support you through the process.
fields.title: GED® Prep Math
